description: This file defines a React-like component for editing notes, using Qwik framework. It provides UI elements such as input fields for note title and content, and handles save, delete, and auto-save functionalities with appropriate signals and event handlers.

methods.name: wrapSave
methods.description: Wraps title and content into a payload object for saving.

methods.name: wrapTick
methods.description: Placeholder for tick or update indication.

methods.name: doSave
methods.description: Performs save operation, manages saving state, and calls parent onSave.$ handler.

methods.name: triggerAutoSave
methods.description: Triggers auto-save with debounce after user input.

methods.name: onDeleteClick
methods.description: Handles delete button click, confirms action, and calls parent onDelete$ handler.
